thread.section_title: Hotel 41 - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location... Unparalleled Service.
thread.title_full: Great location... Unparalleled Service. - Review of Hotel 41, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: chichenuxmal
title: Great location... Unparalleled Service.
text: The location is fantastic. We love to walk around London. Being across the street from the side of Buckingham Palace you are in the center of it all. The service... well, it beats the location ! The best we have ever enjoy in our many visits to London. Our room was well furnished, cozy. The executive lounge a work of art, with exquisite offerings and impecable, friendly service. A true Gem !
